data.name: SVFI Demo
data.detailed_description:
Demo of SVFI

𝗕𝗬 𝗦𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗹 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺
An app to interpolate your low-fps video or image sequence with AI (make it smoother)
Powered by RIFE: A Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation for Video Frame Interpolation Algorithm
- High Flexibility: Interpolate the footage from any fps to another
- High Hardware Compatibility: NVIDIA or AMD graphic cards are supported

data.short_description: SVFI𝗕𝗬 𝗦𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗹 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺An app to interpolate your low-fps video or image sequence with AI (make it smoother)Powered by RIFE: A Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation for Video Frame Interpolation Algorithm
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Graphic Cards
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
